questions.text: Which of the following is a city in Central America?
questions.explanation:
Flores.

	Flores is a city in Guatemala; Fès is a city in Morocco; Fatick is a city in Senegal; and, Florence is a city in Italy.

questions.text: In which of the following countries is the city of Forbach?
questions.explanation:
France.

	Forbach is a French city in the region of Lorraine.

questions.text: Which of the following is a town in Scotland?
questions.explanation:
Falkirk.

	Falkirk is a town situated to the west of Edinburgh. Featherston is a county in New Zealand; Fagatogo is a town in American Samoa; and, Francistown is the capital of the district of the same name in Botswana.

questions.text: Is Fremantle a city in Australia?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Fremantle is a city in the state of Western Australia, established in 1892 as a port.

questions.text: Which of the following is a Brazilian city?
questions.explanation:
Florianopolis.

	Florianopolis is a city in the south of Brazil; Fianarantsoa is a city in Madagascar; Farafenni is a 'locality' in Gambia; and, Fkih-ben-Salah is a city in Morocco.

questions.text: Which of the following is the capital city of the province of New Brunswick, Canada?
questions.explanation:
Fredericton.

	Fredericton is the capital city of New Brunswick; Fort Portal is a town in Uganda; Fort McMurray is in Alberta, Canada; and, Franceville is a 'locality' in Gabon.

questions.text: Which of the following is an Egyptian city?
questions.explanation:
Fariskur.

	Fariskur is a city in the north of Egypt; Ferkéssédougou is a city on the Côte d´Ivoire (the Ivory Coast); Fomboni is the capital city of the island of Mwali which is part of the Comores (in the Indian Ocean); and, Fada Ngourma is a city in Burkina Faso.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a city in the United States?
questions.explanation:
Frankfurt.

	Frankfurt am Main, commonly known as Frankfurt, is one of Germany's largest cities. Lying on the Main River, it is a transport hub and financial centre. Frankfort is the capital city of Kentucky, USA. Fargo is a city in North Dakota, USA, and Fort Worth is a city in Texas, USA.

questions.text: Which of the following is a city in Italy?
questions.explanation:
Faenza.

	Faenza is a city in Italy; Fontana is in California, USA; Figueira da Foz is a city in Portugal; and, Fgura is a 'locality' in Malta.

questions.text: Which of the following is a city in India?
questions.explanation:
Fîrozabad.

	Fîrozabad is a city in India, near New Delhi; Forlì is a city in Italy; Faro is a city in Portugal; and, Franekeradeel is a city in Friesland in the Netherlands.
